General.Name: Linc Limited
General.Description: Linc Limited manufactures and markets writing instruments and stationery products in India and internationally. The company offers gel, ball, roller, retractable ball, and fountain pens; other stationary products; markers/hi-lighters; stationery, such as pencils and mechanical pencils; files and folders; and disinfectants, as well as imports and distributes stationery products. It offers its products under the Linc, Lincplus, Pentonic, Uniball, Deli, and Markline brands. The company was formerly known as Linc Pen & Plastics Limited and changed its name to Linc Limited in October 2021. Linc Limited was incorporated in 1976 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.

1.Name: Mr. Narayan Kumar Dujari
1.Title: CFO, Director of Fin. & Exec. Director
